name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pace: Take control of your time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension with stopwatch and timer to track time, customize breaks, and increase productivity through personal workflows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pace is a sleek and intuitive browser extension designed to help you manage your time efficiently. Whether you're looking to stay on track with a countdown timer or measure time with a stopwatch, Pace provides a simple, distraction-free interface to suit your time management needs. The extension allows users to easily set timers for tasks, track intervals, or monitor elapsed time, perfect for productivity, workouts, or meetings. Stay organized, focused, and punctual with Pace, your personal time management assistant right in your browser.
